description: Number of n-step self-avoiding walks on Manhattan lattice.
references: S. S. Manna and A. J. Guttmann, Kinetic growth walks..., J. Phys. A 22 (1989), 3113-3122.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).

D. Bennett-wood, J. L. Cardy, I. Enting , A. J. Guttmann and A. L. Owczarek, On the Non-Universality of a Critical Exponent for Self-Avoiding~Walks, Nuc. Phys. B, 528, 533--552, 1998. [From Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Sep 13 2010]
author: _Simon Plouffe_
